name: instance_id
comment: The instance architecture. Valid values: i386 | x86_64

name: public_dns_name
comment: The public DNS name of the instance.

name: image_id
comment: The ID of the image used to launch the instance.

name: instance_lifecycle
comment: Indicates whether this is a Spot Instance. Valid values: spot

name: instance_type
comment: The type of instance (for example, m1.small).

name: key_name
comment: The name of the key pair used when the instance was launched.

name: launch_time
comment: The time when the instance was launched (for example, 2010-08-07T11:54:42.000Z).

name: platform
comment: The platform. Use windows if you have Windows based instances; otherwise, leave blank. Valid value: windows

name: private_dns_name
comment: The private DNS name of the instance.

name: private_ip_address
comment: The private IP address of the instance.

name: root_device_name
comment: The name of the root device for the instance (for example, /dev/sda1).

name: root_device_type
comment: The type of root device that the instance uses.Valid values: ebs | instance-store

name: subnet_id
comment: The ID of the subnet for the instance.

name: virtualization_type
comment: The virtualization type of the instance. Valid values: paravirtual | hvm

name: vpc_id
comment: The ID of the VPC that the instance is running in.

name: hypervisor
comment: The hypervisor type of the instance. Valid values: ovm | xen
